name: Hapatus Variety Pack 2016
description: This is a collection of 7 games in different genres I made for the Variety Megajam during the 10 first days of 2016. Playing with the Windows standalone version is recommended since controller doesn't seem to work as well in game 7 (JEOMETRY JARS) in the browser and particle collisions do not work (they're just eyecandy though).
